390479487047311360.text: Because we are here to build on their legacy. We're here to seize the moment before us. And we will. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390479440016572416.text: As we look forward, we draw inspiration from our founders, who dared to create this proud country. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390479346114502656.text: With the celebrations leading to Confederation's 150th birthday in 2017, we are reminded that, from our earliest days ...

390479292075098113.text: We will continue to build on our efforts to tackle crime. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390479219245215744.text: We will also continue to work to protect Canadian consumers. Canadians deserve choice, fair treatment, competitive prices. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390479157379215360.text: Canadians know that we will keep taxes down! # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390479029436166144.text: Always remember, it was our government, small business, and seniors. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390478970149683201.text: By responsibly developing our resources, by taking all of these steps, we will continue creating jobs & opportunities for Canadians. # SFT13

390478919314726912.text: We will soon complete negotiations on a Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement with the European Union. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390478869339570176.text: We are on track to balance our budget. We are expanding our trade. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390478810082467840.text: Instead, the vision will focus on building our economy to make a difference for Canadian families. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390478750917603329.text: And legalizing drugs is not on our agenda. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390478664129085441.text: There will be no reckless economic experiments with people's livelihoods. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390478619610726401.text: There'll be no 20 billion-dollar carbon tax. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390478568385687552.text: Obviously, I'm not going to pre-empt what His Excellency will say. But I can tell you what we will not say ... # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390478256371429376.text: Today, you will hear from the Governor General. In # SFT13, he will tell us how we are going to work.

390478103556128768.text: ... these assets are all aligned. This is Canada's moment, and our job as a gov't to sixteen it for the benefit of all Canadians! # SFT13

390478050049392640.text: ... our expanding network of trade relations around the world, the demand for our resources, the ingenuity of Canadians ...

390477995049488385.text: As a country, we have a rare opportunity before us. Our natural wealth, our finances, our stable democracy ...

390477938019553280.text: That's why, we are not here. We must go further and we must go faster. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390477862538854401.text: We know - and Canadians know - what we face. # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390477810978287616.text: But, for Canada to prosper through the challenges of this world, we must do more. We must keep our eyes on the long term. # SFT13

390477585362472961.text: We lead the G-7 in job creation. We lead the G-7 on the strength of our balance sheet. We lead the G-7 in political stability. # SFT13

390477513614696448.text: Our gov't also proudly tells our national story. We are proud of our history and our values. #cdnpoli # SFT13

390477457037737984.text: At home and abroad, what is it? #cdnpoli # SFT13

390477392361558016.text: And we are standing up for our men & women in uniform, by giving them the equipment they need & the respect they deserve! # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390477215496151040.text: ... legislation to protect Canadians and their families. Now that is a record to be very proud of! # SFT13 #cdnpoli

390477165932068864.text: That's why during the last session, we passed the Safe Streets and Communities Act, and no other than 13 other pieces of legislation ...

390477052413218816.text: Conservatives believe that they have a right to go about their everyday lives without being victimized by crime. # SFT13

390476971802910720.text: Since the depths of the recession, more than a million net new jobs have been created - the best record in the G-7. # SFT13

390476919407661056.text: Debt is low and deficits are falling. Businesses are creating opportunities. More Canadians are working now than ever before. # SFT13
